comments:
I20040210-2200

1. Select a Java project
2. Context menu -> New -> Scrapbook Page
3. Enter a file name (I used "ScrapBookPage")
4. Click Finish
5. Observe an Error Dialogue "Unable to create part: ScrapBookPage.jpage"
6. the scrap book page is correctly created in the folder

here is the error log entry info...

Correction on the timestamp of the build...it was 20040210-2000, not -2200.

Additionally, once the ScrapBookPage is created, an attempt to open it with any
editor produces the same problem. So, I imagine it has nothing to do with
creation, but mostly with editing.

I have a fix for this. We subclass the JavaSourceViewerConfiguration with the 
JavaSnippetViewerConfiguration. We do not require a reconciler, so we can 
override the method causing us trouble, to return null.
